attributes.action: Building of large buiding in rear gardens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many people are building very
large buidings in rear gardens and
being able to call them storage
buidings ,when really are like a small house.
I have one next door to me, not nice,
sight for me and people living around.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
